query:
SELECT * FROM (
                    SELECT
                        bakers.id as id
                    FROM bakers
                    WHERE primed_for_suspension IS NOT NULL AND
                        id > $2 AND id < $1
                    ORDER BY
                        (CASE WHEN $4 THEN bakers.id END) DESC,
                        (CASE WHEN NOT $4 THEN bakers.id END) ASC
                    LIMIT $3
                ) AS primed_for_suspension_bakers
                ORDER BY primed_for_suspension_bakers.id ASC
